description: A object that defines a lookup file and its properties.

case_sensitive_match.description: What the macro is intended to filter

collection.description: Name of the collection to use for this lookup

default_match.description: The default value if no match is found

examples: This lookup contains file names that exist in the Windows\System32 directory

fields_list.description: A comma and space separated list of field names

filename.description: The name of the file to use for this lookup

filter.description: Use this attribute to improve search performance when working with significantly large KV

match_type.description: A comma and space-delimited list of <match_type>(<field_name>) specification to allow for non-exact matching

max_matches.description: The maximum number of possible matches for each input lookup value

min_matches.description: Minimum number of possible matches for each input lookup value

name.description: The name of the lookup to be used in searches

title: Lookup Manifest
